name: HA GIANG, CAO BANG, BAC KAN, The nicest landscape in the North East of Vietnam
description: If you want to escape from the pressure of working in the city center, then how about being in the Mountainous eares of Dong Van Highland Stone and BAN GIOC Water Fall and BA BE LAKE where are the most beautiful lanscapes of VIET NAM? You will have a chance to enjoy your life in Nature, to eat ethnic food , to hear stories, to do things, to stay at traditional houses of Ethnics in the mountainous areas that are so special without in the city. You also have a chance to get lovely experiences of an adventurous trip from Ha noi to Ha Giang, CAO BANG, BAC KAN by Motor and having many nice pictures of VietNamese life. how interesting does it sound?
